title: `$ --status 14a0e075-3de1-4342-97cd-f87c8cd66dda` shows command is still executing, while it actually was `Finished at 2026-01-07 19:29:07.663`
body:
```
konard@MacBook-Pro-Konstantin ~ % bun install -g start-command                   
bun add v1.2.20 (6ad208bc)

installed start-command@0.17.3 with binaries:
 - $

2 packages installed [1.71s]
konard@MacBook-Pro-Konstantin ~ % $ echo 'hi'                                    
╭──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
│ Session ID: c30c6344-fa74-4db6-909a-b25ead8c9ee6         │
│ Starting at 2026-01-07 19:29:07.402: echo hi             │
╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯

hi

╭──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
│ Finished at 2026-01-07 19:29:07.663 in 0.261 seconds     │
│ Exit code: 0                                             │
│ Log: /var/folders/cl/831lqjgd58v5mb_m74cfdfcw0000gn/T/start-command-1767814147402-enhlqg.log │
│ Session ID: c30c6344-fa74-4db6-909a-b25ead8c9ee6         │
╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
konard@MacBook-Pro-Konstantin ~ % $ --status 14a0e075-3de1-4342-97cd-f87c8cd66dda
14a0e075-3de1-4342-97cd-f87c8cd66dda
  uuid 14a0e075-3de1-4342-97cd-f87c8cd66dda
  pid 33834
  status executing
  command "echo hi"
  logPath /var/folders/cl/831lqjgd58v5mb_m74cfdfcw0000gn/T/start-command-1767809164643-fy2l1k.log
  startTime "2026-01-07T18:06:04.729Z"
  workingDirectory /Users/konard
  shell /bin/zsh
  platform darwin
  options
    substitutionMatched false
    runtime Bun
    runtimeVersion 1.2.20
konard@MacBook-Pro-Konstantin ~ %  
```

We need to make sure our stored status is carefully updated as soon as our command finishes.

Please download all logs and data related about the issue to this repository, make sure we compile that data to `./docs/case-studies/issue-{id}` folder, and use it to do deep case study analysis (also make sure to search online for additional facts and data), in which we will reconstruct timeline/sequence of events, find root causes of the problem, and propose possible solutions.
